notes: Each task has a 'plan' field linking to procedure/plan file. Bot reads plan before executing. Francisco can review plan before approving.

T017.title: Mission Control dashboard upgrade - split lanes view
T017.approach: 1. Read current Mission Control code. 2. Add split lanes view (Bot Current, Bot Queue, Human Tasks, Done). 3. Show clickable plan links. 4. Display task board from tasks.json. 5. Test on mobile.
T017.notes: Francisco prioritized this over SEO fixes

T002.title: SEO product title batch fixes (50+ products)
T002.approach: 1. Open Shopify products list. 2. Sort by title length. 3. Fix titles >60 chars to format: [Product] - Mommy and Me Matching | DLM. 4. Batch of 10 at a time. 5. Verify each fix in Google preview.
T002.notes: From SEO audit â€” long titles hurting rankings

T003.title: P2 Moltbot docs audit
T003.approach: 1. Open docs.molt.bot. 2. Checklist mindset: 'Does this reduce time/errors/cost?' 3. Compare our AGENTS.md, SOUL.md against official recommendations. 4. List: Adopt now / Ignore / Revisit later. 5. Hard 2hr cap.

T004.title: Valentine listing optimization
T004.approach: 1. Review current Valentine products in Shopify. 2. Check titles, descriptions, images per SEO procedure. 3. Add urgency copy (Order by Feb 10). 4. Verify pricing per pricing procedure.

T005.title: Announcement bar urgency text
T005.approach: Copy text from quick-wins file, paste in Shopify Theme > Announcement bar

T006.title: Hero banner copy
T006.approach: Open Theme Editor > Image Banner section > Add heading, subtext, button from copy file

T007.title: Hide Christmas nav link
T007.approach: Shopify Admin > Online Store > Navigation > Main menu > Remove Christmas link

T008.title: Add Valentine collection to homepage
T008.approach: Theme Editor > Add section > Featured Collection > Select Valentine's Day

T009.title: Import 2 products via BuckyDrop
T009.approach: Open BuckyDrop > Import > Paste 1688 URLs from quick-wins file > Map variants > Save
